gurmukhi: dYq suq Bgq pRgit piHlwd Bey dyv suq jg mY snIcr bKwnIAY
transliteration: Dait Sout Bhagat Pragati Prahilaad Bhaay , Dayv Sout Jag Mai Saneechar Bakhaaneeai ?
translation: Bhagat Prehlad who made everyone in the city meditate on the name of the Lord, took birth in the house of evil-minded Harnakash. But Sanichar (Saturn) the son of Sun is believed to be an inauspicious and distressing constellation in the world.

gurmukhi: mDupur bwsI kMs ADm Asur Bey lMkw bwsI syvk BBIKn pCwnIAY
transliteration: Madhoupur Baasee Kans Adham Asur Bhaay , Lankaa Baasee Sayvak Bhabheekhan Pachhaaneeai ?
translation: Of the six sacred cities, one is Mathura which was ruled by a vice-ridden demon-like king called Kansa. Also, Bhabhikhan a God-loving devotee was born in Lanka, the infamous city of Ravan.

gurmukhi: swgr gMBIr ibKY ibiKAw pRgws BeI Aih msqik mn audY aunmwnIAY
transliteration: Saagar Ganbheer Bikhai Bikhiaa Pragaas Bhaee , Ahi Masataki Man Udai Ounamaaneeai ?
translation: The deep ocean yielded the death-giving poison. It is also believed that the most poisonous snake has an invaluable jewel in its head.

gurmukhi: brn sQwn lGu dIrG jqn prY AkQ kQw ibnod ibsm n jwnIAY ]407]
transliteration: Baran Sadaan Laghu Deeragh Jatan Parai , Akad Kadaa Binod Bisam N Jaaneeai ?407?
translation: So, considering someone high or low, good or bad because of the place of his birth or family lineage is just a misconception. This is an indescribable and wondrous play of the Lord that no one can know.   (407)
